page.title: 02Day in the life of a farmer.
page.content: We talked to a farmer in the area. The farm is 198 acres mainly pasture. The farmer has got 170 cows. He gets up at 6.00am.First thing in the morning he milks the cows,then he washes down the milking parlour & machines. He turns the cows out of the field. He has his breakfast at 9.30am and continues his work until lunchtime. He has lunch & spends the afternoon mowing and collecting the grass. At 4.00pm he gets ready to milk the cows again, and feeds the calves. He comes in at 7.00pm Other days he might spend his time repairing fencing or seeding.He enjoys his job and says nobody would farm who didn't enjoy it because it is a way of life. His wife helps him. His son works with him & he has one employee.
